snippet: The exhibition “Living in Sequence,” at the Poe Park Visitor Center in the Bronx, pays homage to the ties between the park, which includes the home of Edgar Allan Poe, and the history of comics.
lead_paragraph: The exhibition “Living in Sequence,” at the Poe Park Visitor Center in the Bronx, pays homage to the ties between the park, which includes the home of Edgar Allan Poe, and the history of comics.

headline.seo: ‘Living in Sequence,’ at Poe Park Visitor Center
headline.main: Poe and Comics in the Bronx
